summary: Full stack developer with 10 years of experience. Being part of the travel industry, I worked on many products that makes a traveler's journey as convenient as possible.
I was fortunate to be part of the Vacation Rentals team that was tasked with integrating Vrbo properties in Expedia system.
Currently, I work on Rest/GraphQL Microservices in the back-end and React PWA in the front-end
